name: Mass Combat and Extreme Cold
description:
Published as part of my Chässe-Galerie zine, for Mörk Borg. Can be used independantly of the zine too.

Mass Combat rules originally published in French by Danger is Real on his OSR blog. Adapted to Mörk Borg and translated by Luigi Pizzinu. Check out his Itch page!

Extreme Cold system original idea by Pierre-Philippe Renaud (PP) from Coup Critique. Translated and slightly modified by Luigi Pizzinu.

Mass Combat and Extreme Cold is an independent production by Luigi Pizzinu and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License. MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
